sub_topic: Determine the Ricci curvature of a manifold.
message_1:
Let the Ricci curvature of a 3-dimensional manifold be given as follows:

$R_{ij} = \begin{pmatrix} 2 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 4 & 1 \\ 0 & 1 & 4 \end{pmatrix} $

Determine the scalar curvature of this manifold.
message_2:
The scalar curvature is the trace of the Ricci curvature tensor, which means we sum the diagonal elements of the given matrix:

$R = R_{11} + R_{22} + R_{33} = 2 + 4 + 4 = 10$

So, the scalar curvature of this manifold is 10.
